reviews.review_msg: One of the best. His youth translates into his teaching style and exam style. Very efficient and reasonable in his approach.
I enjoyed having him as a prof!
He teaches well, and he has clear grading scheme. Also, many discussions during every lecture.

Efe is a great professor! I came into this class dreading to learn about theory, but Efe made it engaging and inspiring. Yes, there is a lot of reading, but it is what one should expect going into a theory class. Efe was helpful in reading excerpts with the class to help clarify what Marx, Weber and Durkheim were trying to say. Would recommend!

I love his class. He is funny and very interested in the subject. He really tries to make it as clear as possible and really cares how his students are in class or what they think. I love his movie excerpts he has an amazing taste in that ! Overall, great class for a sociology lover!

He is very passionate and interested in what he teaches. Since this is a seminar class, students are encouraged to speak up. He respects every opinion from the students. Although there are some clarification issues in the first part for the first few assignments, overall, he gave us great feedback for our weekly annotations and assignments.
A lovely prof with a genuine interest in the material and in his students. Docks marks for not participating in class discussion and missing class, so be aware. Is very fair and engaging.

Great guy.  Doesn't come with a regular professor's demeanor and instead is more relaxed.  Class usually dictates the direction of discussion, though he prompts it.  He doesn't give back marks till the end except for weekly annotations, but he is more than fair with grading.  Average workload, relaxed guy, fair marker - it couldn't get much better.

Hands down one of my favourite SA professors! I have taken SA 319 with him previously and thoroughly enjoyed it! Class discussions are interesting but can go off topic sometimes. Other than that, he is extremely helpful and a fair marker! Would definitely recommend!

He is absolute eye-candy, and has a very sexy accent. Efe really cares of your success and encourages office hour discussions. The problem I had with him is I didn't know how I was doing in the course until the final grades were given. Efe never returned our papers, so I think many students were shocked with their marks. He means well, though.
